announcements.message: This version of Retrom can have issues with starting the internal DB. If you are seeing errors like this in your Retrom server you can usually fix it by removing the `postmaster.pid` file found in the `data/db` directory. Feel free to reach out for assistance at the provided link if needed.
This version of Retrom may not be correctly able to detect updates. If you are not seeing prompts to update, please manually update to the latest version.

The 'latest' tag of the retrom service docker image has been corrupted on this release. This will be remedied within 24 hours, but if you are encountering issues you should manually tag your service container to 'ghcr.io/jmberesford/retrom-service:retrom-v0.7.14'
This version of Retrom has critical functionality issues. A client with this version will fail to launch if steam is uninstalled, please update to 0.7.2.
The auto-update feature of Retrom is broken in this release. Please update to version 0.4.2 manually.
This version of Retrom has critical functionality issues. Please update to version 0.4.8 immediately.
